channel.title: others on kKachu
channel.description: Recent content in others on kKachu

item.title: A New Page
item.description: Raison d’Etre I’ve always had a looming feeling that I’m horrible at documenting things; which is weird. You’d think that someone with a perpetual narration going in her head would have no problem pouring her thoughts down to writing. This has manifested in an ugly way, three months into my new job. I am now knee deep in a long, strenuous analytics project with no doc in sight. And the cherry on top is?

item.title: Configuration File: config.toml
item.description: This is the Minimo’s configuration file ( config.toml ) file of this site: baseURL = "http://www.kkachu.github.io" title = "kKachu" # for smart copyright line, leave this blank and check [params.copyright] copyright = "" theme = "minimo" disqusShortname = "" googleAnalytics = "" Paginate = 5 preserveTaxonomyNames = true enableRobotsTXT = true # generate robots.txt # Syntax Highlighting ( https://gohugo.io/content-management/syntax-highlighting/ ) pygmentsCodefences = true enableEmoji = true # Missing translations will default to this content language defaultContentLanguage = "en" [params.
